channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
[center][size=10pt][u][b]Ok I Have Few Questions Please Try To Answer[/b][/u][/size][/center]
1. How do you change the sever menu and show commands on there..? to make normals see theirs and mods and admins see theirs. 2. How do i make it were when i hit dummies, close doors, search hay it gives exp. 3. How come after i change somthing in .java files i simple "save" it then close then i compile it...but when i start my server up it doesnt work..? Like for instance in my .java files there was already command ::pure i just took out 1 of the id's and replaced it with another one...but when i started server it didnt change it...evan though i saved and compiled. 4. When i "runserver" it works but it says "Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0=43594 my port that i have on no-ip is "2xblade-no-ip.biz" it doesn't work only 0.0.0.0 works as ip, and yes i have portforwarded yes i have opened firewalls. [center]I'd Appreciate anyone who answers any of the qustions thankyou[/center]

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @2xbladex2 2xbladex2
item.description:
@2xbladex2 wrote:

[center][size=10pt]Ok I Have Few Questions Please Try To Answer[/size][/center]

  1. How do you change the sever menu and show commands on there…? to make normals see theirs and mods and admins see theirs.
  2. How do i make it were when i hit dummies, close doors, search hay it gives exp.
  3. How come after i change somthing in .java files i simple “save” it then close then i compile it…but when i start my server up it doesnt work…? Like for instance in my .java files there was already command ::pure i just took out 1 of the id’s and replaced it with another one…but when i started server it didnt change it…evan though i saved and compiled.
  4. When i “runserver” it works but it says "Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0=43594 my port that i have on no-ip is “2xblade-no-ip.biz” it doesn’t work only 0.0.0.0 works as ip, and yes i have portforwarded yes i have opened firewalls.
    [center]I’d Appreciate anyone who answers any of the qustions thankyou[/center]

Read full topic
